Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hi can i have the api for redtracker?

Hi! It seems like you're asking about integrating with RedTrack. While I don't have a specific article for RedTrack, you can refer to our general postback integration guide for assistance. You can find it here: [How to integrate a general NewsBreak Postback](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/27680147056397-API-Integration-Guide). If you need further help, feel free to reach out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com.
Hi there! How can I assist you today?
I need help with tracking conversions
Sure thing! Could you let me know which tracking platform you're using, like RedTrack or Voluum? That way, I can provide more specific guidance.

Great! To set up a RedTrack Postback on NewsBreak, follow these steps:

1. Log in to your RedTrack account and click 'Traffic channels.'
2. Click '+ NEW FROM TEMPLATE' and search for NewsBreak.
3. Once you click 'Add,' the NewsBreak Template should open up with the fields populated.
4. Use the s2s URL: `https://business.newsbreak.com/tracking/attribute?callback={ref_id}&event_type={REPLACE}`
5. Replace `{REPLACE}` with your actual conversion event, like `complete_payment`.

For more detailed instructions, you can check out the full guide here: [How to set up a RedTrack Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25515090832013-How-to-set-up-a-RedTrack-Postback-on-NewsBreak). Let me know if you need further assistance!

When i send the postback links i receive this messages

INITIATE CHECKOUT
	https://business.newsbreak.com/tracking/attribute?callback=nvss_C27A501BF2EA41EABBBF79D75A3D3948_1942298345105694721&event_type=initiate_checkout

	{code=0, requestId=C27A501B-F2EA-41EA-BBBF-79D75A3D3948, msg=}
	
COMPLETE PAYMENT
	https://business.newsbreak.com/tracking/attribute?callback=nvss_C27A501BF2EA41EABBBF79D75A3D3948_1942298345105694721&event_type=complete_payment&nb_value=492
	
	{code=0, requestId=C27A501B-F2EA-41EA-BBBF-79D75A3D3948, msg=}

It looks like your postback links are being sent correctly, as indicated by the `{code=0}` in the response, which typically means success. However, the `msg` field is empty, which might suggest that there are no additional messages or errors.

To ensure everything is working smoothly:
1. Double-check that the event types (`initiate_checkout` and `complete_payment`) are correctly set up in your NewsBreak ad account.
2. Verify that any required parameters, like `nb_value`, are included and correctly formatted.
3. Make sure your conversion events are properly configured on both RedTrack and NewsBreak.

If everything seems correct but you're still facing issues, you might want to test the conversion flow end-to-end to ensure data is being tracked accurately.

For more detailed troubleshooting steps, you can refer to the [RedTrack Postback setup guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25515090832013-How-to-set-up-a-RedTrack-Postback-on-NewsBreak). Let me know if there's anything else I can help with!
